Package at.htlle.bank

Class Bank_Weingand

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.htlle.bank.Bank_Weingand
  • public class Bank_Weingand
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds several bank accounts. Has a method to transfer money to account and will hold a total of 100 accounts on start.
    Author:
    Lukas

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Bank_Weingand()
      Calls the second constructor with the parameter 100.
      Bank_Weingand​(int numberOfAccounts)
      Creates a numberOfAccounts amount of new bank accounts.

      • getTotalBalance

        public float getTotalBalance()
        Sums up all balances of the bank's accounts.
        Returns:
        The total amount of money the bank is holding.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:

      • transferMoney

        public void transferMoney​(int accountNumber,
                          float amount)
        Takes a random accountNumber and a random amount of money and adds or subtracts it from the accounts current balance.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - The actual account the money should go to.
        amount - The amount of money the account will get added or removed.
